prompts.title: Generate CRUD Module
instruction: Create a new module based on the existing Company module pattern inside `spa/olivine-app-core/src/modules/`.
Include a List Page, Form Component, and API service or hooks.
Use PageContainer layout and Olivine UI spacing patterns.
Apply TypeScript, Tailwind, and reusable UI patterns.
Update menuConfig and routes.tsx.
Use validation rules based on provided specification or MVP reference.
After implementation, confirm compile success and navigation test.

prompts.title: Connect API Module to Backend
instruction: Identify existing API client or Axios configuration inside Olivine.
Attach authentication token stored in localStorage.
Wire CRUD endpoints following REST naming consistency.
Add proper error handling, loading states, and success notifications.
Update mock API if backend endpoint is missing (include TODO).

prompts.title: Refactor UI to Match Olivine Style
instruction: Remove old UI layouts and replace with Olivine styling.
Use Tailwind spacing, typography, and PageContainer.
Ensure consistent button placement (primary right-aligned).
Use existing reusable UI components if available.
Do not change the global layout or AppShell unless necessary.

prompts.title: Extract Logic or Fields From MVP Code
instruction: Search recursively for matching component or model in the older MVP folder.
Extract only: fields, validation rules, naming conventions, useful logic.
Do NOT copy layout, CSS, old patterns, or outdated architecture.
Transform extracted logic to align with Olivine folder structure and patterns.

prompts.title: Generate Transaction Module (BBP Spec-Based)
instruction: Use BBP (Blueprint) to map required fields, sections, workflow states, and rules.
Create List view, Form screen, and Workflow action buttons.
Ensure screen respects Olivine UX standards.
Add placeholders for workflow actions (Submit, Approve, Reject, Cancel).
Wire model to mock API if backend isnâ€™t ready.
Mark backend TODO areas clearly.

prompts.title: Validate Against BBP
instruction: Compare current module implementation against BBP specification.
Check: fields, workflow states, validation rules, required flags, data types, relationships.
Generate a mismatch report if deviations exist.
Suggest fixes but do NOT apply unless instructed.

prompts.title: Code Cleanup & Standardization
instruction: Remove unused imports, commented-out legacy code, or deprecated logic.
Verify naming conventions follow Olivine standards.
Run formatting rules (TS rules + Prettier).
Ensure type safety and avoid `any` unless temporary.
Summarize all changes after modification.
